thread.title: BRIEF-XG Technology Says Assessing Strategic Alternatives Related To xMax Division

title: BRIEF-XG Technology Says Assessing Strategic Alternatives Related To xMax Division
text:
April 30, 2018 / 12:00 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-XG Technology Says Assessing Strategic Alternatives Related To xMax Division Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - xG Technology Inc:
* XG TECHNOLOGY ANNOUNCES FURTHER COST REDUCTION INITIATIVES YIELDING AN ADDITIONAL $5 MILLION IN ANNUAL SAVINGS
* XG TECHNOLOGY - CO ALSO ASSESSING STRATEGIC ALTERNATIVES RELATED TO XMAX DIVISION INCLUDING, POSSIBILITY OF DIVESTITURE OF DIVISION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
